---
title: "Online resources"
---

Libros online sobre *Geocomputation* con R, Python y Julia:

-   R books: [Geocomputation with R](https://r.geocompx.org/), [Spatial Data Science](https://r-spatial.org/book/), [Geographic Data Science with R](https://bookdown.org/mcwimberly/gdswr-book/)

-   Python books: [Geocomputation with Python](https://py.geocompx.org/), [Introduction to Python for Geographic Data Analysis](https://pythongis.org/), [Geographic Data Science with Python](https://geographicdata.science/book/intro.html)

-   Julia video: [JuliaGeo: a gentle introduction](https://av.tib.eu/media/59405)
